snippet: It's hardly a secret weapon. Everyone knows Lionel Messi shoots with his left foot nine times out of 10....

headline.print_headline: Argentina's Only Sparkle: Messi's Left Foot
headline.main: Argentina's Only Sparkle: Messi's Left Foot

lead_paragraph: It's hardly a secret weapon. Everyone knows Lionel Messi shoots with his left foot nine times out of 10.
